Smart Life, Smart Living

MOVAhome App is a professional cleaning management tool that developed specifically for MOVA robotic vacuum cleaners. Connect with your MOVA robot through MOVAhome App to remotely control and personalize the management of cleaning spaces and schedules, giving you control of your homes floor cleaning anytime, anywhere. Unlock a variety of advanced features with ease through the MOVAhome App:
Device Information: Monitor your robot in real-time to precisely track its cleaning progress and path, work status, any malfunctions or anomalies, and the lifespan of cleaning consumables.
Remote Control: Connect with the device to remotely control the robot, set cleaning schedules, and adjust various parameters such as water flow and suction power.
Zone Selection & Cleaning Customization: Select and customize cleaning areas through an intuitive map interface, pinpointing the exact locations you wish to clean.
Scheduled Cleaning: Set up timed cleaning appointments, and the robot will start the task at the designated time and autonomously return to its charging dock upon completion.
Home Mapping: Create a personalized home map with custom room names and divided areas, and plan settings like floor material and cleaning sequence to meet the needs of your family.
No-Go Zones: Set no-go zones on your map, ensuring that the robot avoids these areas during cleaning to prevent entry into designated off-limits spaces.
Firmware Upgrades: Update your robot to the latest firmware version with a single click through OTA technology, and be among the first to experience cutting-edge features.
Voice Connection: Register and log into the app to connect with your robot, enabling compatibility with third-party voice assistant platforms for convenient voice control functions.

NEMH2O is an innovative robot, developed by the creators of Ambrogio Robot, in order to have a completely automatic pool cleaner.
NEMH2O is autonomous 365 days a year: with NEMH20 you dont need to clean the pool or resort to a winter cover.
NEMH2O requires no power cords and can also be used without a filter (using the existing filters in each pool), he gets recharged through induction directly by itself in the water and programmed via bluetooth (software upgradeable via APP).

REMOTE CONTROL C For latest mower. Connect and interact with the robot every time and everywhere.  Verify location isolate and/or work on specific areas of the garden, monitor the status of the robot and receive alerts when it comes out of the garden.

Segway Navimow is an advanced robotic mower that uses a virtual boundary, eliminating the need for complicated perimeter wiring. Easy to operate and manage, Navimow gives you more free time to do the things you love and an effortlessly impeccable lawn with every use.
With the help of Navimow app, you can:
1. Easily install and activate the device by following the detailed tutorials.
2. Create a virtual working zone for your mower. Understand your lawn area and create a corresponding map. Just remote control the mower to set up the boundary, off-limit area, and channel. Even multiple lawn areas can be managed at your fingertip.
3. Set the mowing schedule. You can either choose to use the recommended schedule auto-generated based on your preferences or select the mowing time by yourself.
4. Monitor the mower at any time. You can check the mower status, mowing progress, remote control the mower to start or stop working whenever you want.
5. Personalize features and settings. Features like the cutting height, work mode can be adjusted with just a few clicks.
Should you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send an Email to: support-navimow@rlm.segway.com
To know more about Navimow models and technical details, please visit our website: https://navimow.segway.com

The Bioservo app is used to manage?the grip-strengthening gloves Ironhand and Carbonhand from Bioservo Technologies.
In the app, you can?customize?the gloves according to the user's needs and keep track of your Ironhand systems.
Functions for Carbonhand
When using Carbonhand, the Bioservo app is used to customize the glove for a specific user.
The main features are:
- Calibrating the glove to fit the users hand.
- Configure features like responsiveness, force and stickiness, as well as linking sensors to different fingers, all of which can be saved in profiles to be used for different tasks.
- Assign profiles to the three slots in the physical user interface.
- Activate/deactivate the Lock assist function.
- Enable an external button for activating the glove.
AI-enhanced mobility

Carbonhand is an innovative and user-friendly grip enhancing glove. This app is designed to be used with this glove in order to tailor its functionality to suit the wearer's needs. In the app, you can find presets and also create your own settings. The app can only be used together with the Carbonhand from Bioservo. To learn more, visit: http://www.bioservo.com
